product_name: Just Tomatoes, Etc.! Just Fruit Salad Fruit Snack - 2 oz.
long_description: The Just Tomatoes, Etc.! Just Fruit Salad fruit snack combines freeze-dried pears, apples, peaches, bananas, strawberries and red grapes for a tasty snack you can enjoy anywhere. No preparation necessary-just open the package and enjoy. Can also be added to muffins, pies, cobblers, cookies, pancakes and yogurt. Contents are equivalent to approximately 1 lb. of fresh fruit. Resealable package keeps the freeze-dried fruit crisp. Just Tomatoes, Etc.! Just Fruit Salad fruit snack has no additives, preservatives or sweeteners; naturally gluten, dairy, wheat and nut free. *Discount will be applied when you check out; offer not valid for sale-price items ending in $._3 or $._9.
short_description: The Just Tomatoes, Etc.! Just Fruit Salad fruit snack combines freeze-dried pears, apples, peaches, bananas, strawberries and red grapes for a tasty snack you can enjoy anywhere.
